div.bibl: Revyen, Aug. 7, 1897. [CENTRAL COMMITTEE ARRANGES EVENING FOR MRS. RIIS](Summary)

body.p: The Central Committee has arranged a big evening on August 15 for the Danish actress, Mrs. Elisabeth Riis. This affair will be supported by all the Danish societies in Chicago. Mrs. Riis will read several poems and a Danish play. There will be a concert and a dance afterwards.
Mrs. Riis has travelled five thousand miles, and appeared before large crowds of people...here in Chicago. As before, she is staying with the Orckenholt family.
